hero_title: Stop guessing. Start mastering your dough.
hero_subtitle: DoughLabPro is your personal dough lab: an advanced calculator, bake tracker, and Levain Pet manager designed for serious home bakers and artisan pizza lovers.
hero_bullet_1: Turn hydration, fermentation and flour blends into science.
hero_bullet_2: Track your bakes, your Levain and your environment.
hero_bullet_3: Built for Neapolitan, NY, pan pizza, sourdough and more.
hero_microcopy: Costs less than 25¢ a day. Cheaper than a coffee.
social_text: Whether you're dialing in your first Neapolitan pizza or chasing the perfect open crumb, DoughLabPro gives you the tools and structure to repeat great results.
how_step1: Choose your style and tell the app how much dough you need.
how_step2: Let the calculator handle hydration, salt, flour blends and preferments with professional precision.
how_step3: Save your bakes, feed your Levain Pet and track your progress over time.
feature_calc_desc: Guided and advanced modes. Handles levain, poolish, biga. Built for precision.
feature_mylab_desc: Save bakes with notes, ratings, photos. Analyze your dough evolution. Clone formulas instantly.
feature_levain_desc: Track feedings, hydration and health. Never forget a feeding. Pro: unlimited Levain Pets and deeper insights.
feature_learn_desc: Technical breakdowns of classic styles. Educational content on fermentation and gluten. Pro: unlock advanced articles and niche styles.
plans_title: Start free. Unlock Pro when you're ready.
plan_pro_monthly_micro: Costs less than 25¢ a day — cheaper than a coffee.
plan_pro_annual_micro: One small yearly investment. 12 months of better bakes.
fomo_text: One flat pizza or under-proofed loaf often costs more than a month of Pro. DoughLabPro helps you get it right more often, so your time and ingredients turn into results — not frustration.
fomo_micro: Serious home bakers rely on data, not luck.
faq_q1: Do I need Pro to use DoughLabPro?
faq_a1: No. Free includes 1 Levain Pet, 1 saved bake and the core calculator.
faq_a2: Yes, anytime. You keep Free access.
faq_a3: Yes, DoughLabPro works on all devices.
faq_q4: Is it for beginners or advanced bakers?
faq_a4: Both. Guided mode for beginners, advanced tools for experts.
cta_title: Ready to turn your kitchen into a dough lab?
cta_subtitle: Start for free today and upgrade to Pro when you're ready.
cta_micro: Less than the price of a beer. More than worth it for perfect dough.
